#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-

from genericpath import isdir
import os
import re
import time
from tkinter import E
from turtle import done


# è·å–æ–°æ–‡ä»¶å
def get_new_name(file):
 with open(file,'r',encoding='utf8') as md:
 line=md.readlines()
 obtitle=""
 obdate=""
 obslug=""
 for i in range(0, 11):
 if("title:" in line[i]):
 obtitle="-"+line[i][6:].replace("\n","").replace(" ","").replace("\"","")
 continue
 elif("date:" in line[i]):
 obdate=re.search(r"(\d{2}-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2})",line[i]).group(0).replace("-","")
 continue
 elif("slug:" in line[i]):
 obslug="-"+line[i][5:].replace("\n","").replace(" ","").replace("\"","")
 continue
 recname=obdate+obtitle+obslug
 return recname


# å¯¹æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ›´å
def rename_of_file(file):
 newname=get_new_name(file)+os.path.basename(file)[-3:]
 newfullname=os.path.dirname(file)+os.altsep+newname
 if(os.path.basename(file) == newname):
 print("æ— éœ€æ›´æ”¹ï¼š"+os.path.basename(file))
 fplog.write("\n"+"æ— éœ€æ›´æ”¹ï¼š"+os.path.basename(file))
 elif(os.path.basename(file) != newname):
 try:
 os.rename(file,newfullname)
 except:
 print("\n"+"!!!â€”â€”"*5+"\næ­¤å¤„æ›´æ”¹æ–‡ä»¶åå‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·å¤„ç†:\n"+file+"\n"+"!!!â€”â€”"*5)
 fplog.write("\n"+"\n"+"!!!â€”â€”"*5+"\næ­¤å¤„æ›´æ”¹æ–‡ä»¶åå‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·å¤„ç†:\n"+file+"\n"+"!!!â€”â€”"*5)
 os.system("pause")
 print(time.strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S",time.localtime()))
 print("\nåŸåç§°ï¼š"+os.path.basename(file)+"\næ–°åç§°ï¼š"+newname+"="*20 + "\n")
 fplog.write("\n"+"åŸåç§°ï¼š"+os.path.basename(file)+"\n"+"æ–°åç§°ï¼š"+newname+"\n"+"="*20 + "\n")


# ä»mdæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­è·å–ç›¸å…³å†…å®¹æ›´æ”¹æ–‡ä»¶å
def sync_file_name_from_md(dir,ignore):
 newdir=dir
 if os.path.isfile(dir):
 if(os.path.basename(dir) not in ignore):
 try:
 if dir.split('.')[-1]=='md':
 rename_of_file(dir)
 except:
 print("\n"+"!!!â€”â€”"*5+"\næ­¤å¤„æ›´æ”¹åˆ¤æ–­æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·å¤„ç†:\n"+dir+"\n"+"!!!â€”â€”"*5)
 fplog.write("\n"+"\n"+"!!!â€”â€”"*5+"\næ­¤å¤„æ›´æ”¹åˆ¤æ–­æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·å¤„ç†:\n"+dir+"\n"+"!!!â€”â€”"*5)
 os.system("pause")
 elif os.path.isdir(dir):
 for s in os.listdir(dir):
 newdir=os.path.join(dir,s)
 sync_file_name_from_md(newdir,ignore)





if __name__=='__main__':

 # æŒ‡å®šå·¥ä½œç›®å½•ï¼Œ'r'æ˜¯é˜²æ­¢å­—ç¬¦è½¬ä¹‰

 # æŒ‡å®šå¿½ç•¥çš„æ–‡ä»¶å
